categories.name: I-Beam
categories.details: Precision-engineered I-beam made from top-grade steel, ensuring outstanding durability and strength

categories.name: H-Beam
categories.details: High-quality H-beam crafted from premium steel, offering exceptional durability and strength.

categories.name: Box Bar
categories.details: Sturdy square or rectangular steel bar with a hollow center, offering exceptional strength.

categories.name: Angle Beam
categories.details: L-shaped angle beam forged from high-quality steel, providing excellent structural support and reinforcement.

categories.name: Channel Beam
categories.details: Premium C-shaped channel beam manufactured from superior steel.

categories.name: Flat Iron
categories.details: Top-quality flat iron with a sleek and durable design, crafted from premium steel.

categories.name: Trusses
categories.details: Expertly designed trusses featuring a robust triangular pattern. Crafted from high-quality materials for reliable support in roofing and structural applications.

categories.name: M.S. Plates (Mild Steel Plates)
categories.details: High-grade mild steel plates, available in various thicknesses for structural applications.

categories.name: Checker Plates
categories.details: Checker plates with a raised pattern for enhanced traction and durability. Ideal for flooring, stairs, and platforms where slip resistance is crucial

categories.name: Hex Nuts and Bolts
categories.details: Premium hex nuts and bolts made from top-grade materials. Designed for secure and reliable joining of structural components in construction.

categories.name: Fasteners
categories.details: A comprehensive range of fasteners, including screws and rivets, crafted for durability and precision.

categories.name: Welding Rods
categories.details: High-quality welding rods, crafted for efficient and robust welding processes. Ideal for joining metals and ensuring structural integrity.

categories.name: Paints
categories.details: Premium coating paints designed for surfaces, offering both protection and a polished aesthetic finish

categories.name: Galvanizing
categories.details: Galvanizing service for steel, providing a protective layer of zinc. Ensures longevity and resistance against corrosion in various construction applications.

categories.name: Steel Door
categories.details: Robust steel door crafted for security and durability. Made from high-quality steel for reliable performance and long-lasting use in building entrances

categories.name: Corrugated Sheet
categories.details: Roofing or cladding sheets with parallel ridges and grooves for strength.

categories.name: Roofing sheet
categories.details: Large, flat materials (metal, plastic, fiberglass) used for roofing.

categories.name: Aluminium Sheet
categories.details: Lightweight and corrosion-resistant, an aluminum sheet is versatile and often employed in aerospace, automotive, and construction applications.

categories.name: Aluminium Chequered Plate
categories.details: An aluminum plate with a raised pattern for enhanced slip resistance, ideal for flooring, stairs, and other applications requiring traction.

categories.name: Galvanized Coil
categories.details: A steel coil coated with a layer of zinc for corrosion resistance, commonly used in the production of roofing materials and various structural components.

categories.name: Curved Roofing
categories.details: Specially designed roofing material that can be bent or shaped to create a curved roof profile, adding a unique and aesthetically pleasing dimension to architectural designs.

categories.name: Gutters & Accessories
categories.details: A system of channels and pipes designed to collect and divert rainwater from the roof, preventing water damage to the building. Accessories include downspouts, gutter guards, and connectors

categories.name: Purlin
categories.details: A horizontal structural member in a roof, often made of steel or wood, supporting the roof covering and transferring loads to the main framework. Purlins provide additional strength and stability to the roof structure.

categories.name: Metal Cladding
categories.details: A protective layer of metal, often aluminum or steel, applied to surfaces for aesthetic appeal, weather resistance, and additional structural support.

categories.name: Aluminium Foil
categories.details: A thin, pliable sheet of aluminum known for its excellent heat conductivity and barrier properties, commonly used for food packaging, insulation, and cooking.

categories.name: Perforated Sheet
categories.details: Sheets of metal or other materials with punched holes or patterns, allowing for ventilation, filtration, or decorative applications in various industries.

categories.name: Wall Cladding
categories.details: An exterior covering for walls, available in diverse materials like metal, wood, or composite, providing both decorative features and additional protection against the elements.
